11:03 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning  
11:03 <vmassol> are you sending the BFD summary email?  
11:03 <mflorea> good morning vmassol, yes, soon  
11:03 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <vmassol> ok  
11:04 <vmassol> FTR I'm still trying to fix office import on Libreoffice 4.1 on mac for a while  
11:04 <vmassol> I'll move on if I haven't progressed in 1 hour ;)  
11:11 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:26 <chalx> has joined #xwiki

16:26 <tmortagne> mflorea: looks like xwiki-platform-feed-api/ was expecting to get jtidy from oldcore  
16:27 <tmortagne> (jenkins fail)  
16:27 <mflorea> tmortagne: thanks, I'll look into it  
16:33 <polx> has quit  
16:43 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <tdelafosse> has quit  
17:13 <camil7> seems moving the translation keys for annotations from Platform.XWikiCoreResources to Platform.AnnotationCodeTranslations zeroed out a lot of translations in l10n.wiki.org  
17:14 <camil7> I am currently about to copy over the german translation but I wonder is that might be scriptable instead \_  
17:18 <polx> has quit  
17:20 <tmortagne> camil7: the keys are still in Platform.XWikiCoreResources, they have been copied and not moved AFAIK  
17:20 <tmortagne> they are deprecated in Platform.XWikiCoreResources  
17:21 <camil7> tmortagne: I just noticed that in my local dev-instance the german translations are missing for the annotations, and l10n has two versions for every key  
17:22 <camil7> so I thought the duplicake keys there were the reason, but maybe it is something else  
17:22 <tmortagne> as I said you have two version because the keys exists in both resources  
17:22 <tmortagne> but the values have not been copied  
17:22 <tmortagne> just the keys  
17:23 <sburjan> has quit  
17:23 <tmortagne> but you don't need to copy them one by one or use a script, you can use batch import  
17:24 <camil7> ah, I did not know about batch import  
17:24 <tmortagne> it take list of key=value like in a document translation itself  
17:25 <tmortagne> ( http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Platform/AnnotationCodeTranslations?action=batchimport&language=de )  
17:25 <tmortagne> l10n is still missing some automated copy when moving keys from one resource to another  
17:25 <camil7> and anyway, I see I have a manually created ApplicationResources\_de.properties in my local dev instance, that explains a few things :-/  
17:26 <camil7> but then, I guess it does not hurt to copy over the translations to the new keys, if the old ones are still in use but deprecated  
17:27 <camil7> anyway, thanks!  now I only need an export for the old key=value ... but that is just matter of copy & paste the HTML results and apply a simple sed script ;)  
17:35 <tmortagne> camil7: you should have them in an export of ApplicationResources\_de.properties  
17:35 <tmortagne> http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/L10NCode/GetTranslationFile?name=Platform.XWikiCoreResources&language=de&app=Platform&xpage=plain  
17:36 <tmortagne> (deprecated keys are still exported in translations, they are just not listed in the translation form)  
17:36 <camil7> ah, this works much better than screen scraping ;)  
17:36 <tmortagne> yea I guess :)  
17:37 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
17:39 <camil7> I wonder if I should update the other languages, too, as it is mostly export, copy & import, without understanding what it means ... but a few translation are already updates so I better leave them alone ...
